name: Flying Polyp
description: A Huge aberration with a chaotic and evil nature, featuring extraordinary flight capabilities and significant defenses with natural armor.
memorable: Its ability to control the battlefield with Auras and a powerful Cyclone attack makes it a daunting opponent.
goals: To dominate the battlefield and control the movement of foes while dealing significant damage.
relations: Often encountered alone or serving more powerful chaotic beings.
environment: Typically found in desolate or chaotic areas, such as stormy skies or unstable planes.
strengths: Has powerful control abilities like Aura of Wind and Cyclone, offering battlefield manipulation while remaining elusive.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to lightning damage, which can be exploited by strategic opponents.
attacks: Utilizes tentacles for grappling and bludgeoning damage, alongside a vicious bite against restrained creatures.
most_powerful_ability: Cyclone, a damaging area attack that knocks opponents prone.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to perceive its environment without needing sight.
skills: Proficient in Arcana and History, demonstrating high intelligence and knowledge.
additional_information: Incorporeal Movement allows it to move through objects as difficult terrain.
Magic Resistance grants it advantage on saving throws against spells.
Can cast invisibility at will and control weather once per day.
Immune to the prone condition, making it difficult to incapacitate.
spellcasting: Innate spellcaster with spells including invisibility, wind walk, and control weather.
test_queries: huge monster that controls the battlefield
flying creature with powerful wind abilities
chaotic creature immune to being knocked prone
monster that grapples and deals bludgeoning damage
aberration that can transition between planes
